name: The Trinity Warriors
description:
Can you bring out the inner Ninja Warrior in you?

Download and play now!

 Join in our amazing adventure on The Trinity Warriors.

Mission Starting in 3...2...1

The City has been attacked by the ghosts and the warrior has been summoned to save the city.

 If you encounter the ghosts you must dodge them and safely take the figures to the god's acre. The warrior also has been gifted a magic element that can be used only once in the difficult levels further.

 Defeat the enemies and save the day.

 Do you copy that?

Over and Out!
